document_data.name: Starsunder
document_data.Personality: He was welcoming, but really wanted his secrets kept.
document_data.Description: He wore a blue open-breasted shirt, leather breeches, and high boots.{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|713-714|15}}
document_data.Activities: He was privy to matters of [[phaerimm]], [[malaugrym]], and [[sharn]].{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|681-683|15}}
document_data.Abilities: He was capable of learning about damage to distant forests at will, and knew where a number of ''[[portal]]s'' were.{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|743-746|20}}
document_data.Possessions: He had two teardrop-shaped objects hovering near his head.
